pr_title: Sb fix doc generated for exclude include filter properties

timeline.message: style(help): fix generated doc for ExcludeInclude lists; have only done maven scopes so far
refactor: eliminated the ExcludedIncludedWildcardFilterFactor... didn't see worth the cost

timeline.bodyText: I know it doesn't currently allow it, but we should be allowed to create ExcludedIncludedWildcardFilter with already created sets/lists. This seems a little silly.
timeline.author: taikuukaits

replies.bodyText: Agreed, I just create a PR against integration-common for that change blackducksoftware/integration-common#31
replies.author: stevebillings

timeline.message: refactor: Added TODO for an INTCMN ticket.

fix: expanded exclude/include property type/doc fix to cover detect.gradle.excluded.configurations, detect.gradle.excluded.projects, detect.gradle.included.configurations, detect.gradle.included.projects, detect.maven.excluded.modules, detect.maven.included.modules, detect.maven.included.scopes, detect.maven.excluded.scopes, detect.nuget.excluded.modules, detect.nuget.included.modules, detect.sbt.excluded.configurations, detect.sbt.included.configurations
